About me

Having begun in physcial product design, (Industrial Design) I seem to have come full circle in the last couple of years into digital product design, where I've complimented my 10 year career in User Experience Design with UI Design, Branding and Logo design, and more recently, HTML/ CSS skills. I cover most aspects of the digital design process, so if you need anything, just get in touch.
